blocks.name: ctop
blocks.content: Syntax for the class of topologies.
blocks.origin: const class ctop { Top }

blocks.name: diff.ctop.s
diff.ctop.c
diff.ctop.w
df-top
blocks.content: Define the class of topologies. It is a proper class (see ~ topnex ). See ~ istopg and ~ istop2g for the corresponding characterizations, using respectively binary intersections like in this definition and nonempty finite intersections. The final form of the definition is due to Bourbaki (Def. 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.1), while the idea of defining a topology in terms of its open sets is due to Aleksandrov. For the convoluted history of the definitions of these notions, see Gregory H. Moore, _The emergence of open sets, closed sets, and limit points in analysis and topology_, Historia Mathematica 35 (2008) 220--241. (Contributed by NM, 3-Mar-2006.) (Revised by BJ, 20-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: istopg
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` J ` is a topology". See ~ istop2g for another characterization using nonempty finite intersections instead of binary intersections. Note: In the literature, a topology is often represented by a calligraphic letter T, which resembles the letter J. This confusion may have led to J being used by some authors (e.g., K. D. Joshi, _Introduction to General Topology_ (1983), p. 114) and it is convenient for us since we later use ` T ` to represent linear transformations (operators). (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 3-Mar-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm istopg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))), wa(wral(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, ctop, wa(wral(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))), wa(wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuni(cv(s0)))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-top(hs0, s0, s1)
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))
  df-ral(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  albidv(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))
  imbi1d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  elpw2g(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wral(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: istop2g
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` J ` is a topology" using nonempty finite intersections instead of binary intersections as in ~ istopg . (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2006.)

blocks.name: uniopn
blocks.content: The union of a subset of a topology (that is, the union of any family of open sets of a topology) is an open set. (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 27-Feb-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniopn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))
  mpid(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(cuni(c1), c0), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  simpld(wcel(c0, ctop), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))))
  istopg(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop)
  pm2.43d(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wi(wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(cuni(c1), c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wi(wss(c1, c0), wi(wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))))
  com23(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wss(c1, c0), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wi(wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wi(wss(c1, c0), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))), wcel(c1, cpw(c0)))
  biimpar(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cpw(c0)))
  elpw2g(c0, ctop, c1)
  spcgv(hs0, c1, cpw(c0), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wi(wss(c1, c0), wcel(cuni(c1), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wss(c1, c0), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  eleq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0, cuni(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wss(c1, c0), wcel(cuni(c1), c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uniopn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→ ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)
  mpid(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  simpld(c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)))
  ibi(c0 ∈ Top, (∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0))))
  istopg(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop)
  pm2.43d(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, (∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0))→ ⋃ c1 ∈ c0))
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, (c1 ⊆ c0 →(∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0))→ ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)))
  com23((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0)), ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0))→(c1 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)), c1 ∈ P(c0))
  biimpar(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ P(c0))
  elpw2g(c0, ctop, c1)
  spcgv(hs0, c1, P(c0), (hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0), (c1 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ c1 ∈ c0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ⊆ c0, ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)
  sseq1(hs0, c1, c0)
  eleq1d(⋃ hs0, c0, ⋃ c1, hs0 = c1)
  unieq(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ c1 ∈ c0))
}

blocks.name: iunopn
blocks.content: The indexed union of a subset of a topology is an open set. (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunopn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(ciun(s0, c1, c2), c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(ciun(s0, c1, c2), c0)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  eqeltrd(ciun(s0, c1, c2), c0, cuni(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(ciun(s0, c1, c2), cuni(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))))
  dfiun2g(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c0)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cuni(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), c0), wss(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), c0))
  ibi(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), c0))
  uniiunlem(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c0, c0)
  uniopn(c0, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iunopn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ c0), d(s0, c1))
  eqeltrd(⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2), c0, ⋃ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)}, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ Top, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)= ⋃ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)})
  dfiun2g(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c0)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ Top, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), ⋃ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ∈ c0, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ⊆ c0)
  ibi(∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ⊆ c0)
  uniiunlem(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c0, c0)
  uniopn(c0, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)})
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: inopn
blocks.content: The intersection of two open sets of a topology is an open set. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm inopn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))
  simprd(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))), wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wal(hs0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))))
  istopg(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs1)), c0))
  eleq1d(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0, cin(c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(cin(c1, cv(hs1)), c0, cin(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  ineq2(cv(hs1), c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs1)), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inopn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→(c1 ⋂ c2)∈ c0)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, (c1 ⋂ c2)∈ c0)
  syl5com(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0), (c1 ⋂ c2)∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)))
  simprd(c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  ibi(c0 ∈ Top, (∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0))))
  istopg(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c0, (hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0, (c1 ⋂ c2)∈ c0, (c1 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)
  eleq1d((hs0 ⋂ hs1), c0, (c1 ⋂ hs1), hs0 = c1)
  ineq1(hs0, c1, hs1)
  eleq1d((c1 ⋂ hs1), c0, (c1 ⋂ c2), hs1 = c2)
  ineq2(hs1, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ⋂ c2)∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: fitop
blocks.content: A topology is closed under finite intersections. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Oct-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm fitop(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), c0))
} = {
  mpbid(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))
  ralrimivv(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  3expib(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  inopn(c0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  inficl(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fitop(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(fi ` c0)= c0)
} = {
  mpbid(c0 ∈ Top, (fi ` c0)= c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)))
  ralrimivv(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, c0 ∈ Top, (hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)
  3expib(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, (hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈ c0)
  inopn(c0, hs0, hs1)
  inficl(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
}

blocks.name: fiinopn
blocks.content: The intersection of a nonempty finite family of open sets is open. (Contributed by FL, 20-Apr-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiinopn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wi(w3a(wss(c1, c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cint(c1), c0)))
} = {
  com12(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wss(c1, c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cint(c1), c0))
  3imp(wss(c1, c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn), wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cint(c1), c0)))
  pm2.43i(wss(c1, c0), wi(wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wcel(c1, cfn), wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cint(c1), c0)))))
  com4l(wss(c1, c0), wss(c1, c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn), wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cint(c1), c0)))
  pm2.43a(wcel(c1, cfn), wss(c1, c0), wi(wss(c1, c0), wi(wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cint(c1), c0)))))
  syl6bir(wcel(c1, cfn), wss(c1, c0), wi(wcel(c1, cfn), wi(wss(c1, c0), wi(wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cint(c1), c0))))), wcel(c1, cpw(c0)))
  elpwg(c1, cfn, c0)
  com4r(wcel(c1, cpw(c0)), wcel(c1, cfn), wss(c1, c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cint(c1), c0)))
  com3r(wcel(c1, cfn), wss(c1, c0), wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wcel(c1, cpw(c0)), wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cint(c1), c0))))

thm fiinopn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))
} = {
  com12(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), ⋂ c1 ∈ c0)
  3imp(c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈ Fin, (c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))
  pm2.43i(c1 ⊆ c0, (c1 ≠ ∅ →(c1 ∈ Fin →(c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))))
  com4l(c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈ Fin, (c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))
  pm2.43a(c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ⊆ c0, (c1 ⊆ c0 →(c1 ≠ ∅ →(c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))))

  elpwg(c1, cfn, c0)
  com4r(c1 ∈ P(c0), c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ≠ ∅, (c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))
  com3r(c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ≠ ∅, (c1 ∈ P(c0)→(c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0)))
  3exp(c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈ Fin, (c1 ∈ P(c0)→(c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0)))
  com12((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), c1 ∈ P(c0), (c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, P(c0), ((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→(c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0)), ((hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→(c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, (hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin), (c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0), (c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ≠ ∅, hs0 ∈ Fin, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈ Fin)
  sseq1(hs0, c1, c0)
  neeq1(hs0, c1, emptycls)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, cfn)
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, c0 ∈ Top, ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0, ⋂ c1 ∈ c0)
  eleq1d(⋂ hs0, c0, ⋂ c1, hs0 = c1)
  inteq(hs0, c1)
  syl11((hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin), c0 ∈ Top, ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0, (∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0))∧ ∀(hs0,((hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0))))
  adantl(∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0)), ∀(hs0,((hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0)), ((hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0))
  sp(hs0, ((hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0))
  ibi(c0 ∈ Top, (∀(hs0,(hs0 ⊆ c0 → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0))∧ ∀(hs0,((hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0))))
  istop2g(hs0, c0, ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→(c0 ∈ Top → ⋂ c1 ∈ c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm iinopn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))), wcel(ciin(s0, c1, c2), c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(ciin(s0, c1, c2), c0, cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))), wceq(ciin(s0, c1, c2), cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))
  dfiin2g(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c0)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))), wcel(cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))), c0), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), c0), wne(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), emptycls), wcel(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cfn))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))))
  syl5eqssr(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), c0, crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))))
  frnd(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))), wne(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), emptycls), wne(cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls))
  eqnetrd(cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls, c1, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))))
  fdmd(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))), wf(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c0), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))
  fmpt(s0, c1, c2, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))
  necon3bii(cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), emptycls)
  bitri(wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls), wceq(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), emptycls), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls))
  dm0rn0(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqeq1i(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), w3a(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))), wcel(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)))

thm iinopn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0)))→ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2), c0, ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)}, (c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))), ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)= ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)}, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))
  dfiin2g(s0, hs0, c1, c2, c0)
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))), ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ∈ c0, c0 ∈ Top, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ⊆ c0, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ≠ ∅, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ∈ Fin)
  simpl(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0)))
  syl5eqssr({ hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)}, c0, ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), (c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))))
  frnd((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c0, c1, (c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))))
  sylib((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ≠ ∅, dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))≠ ∅)
  eqnetrd(dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), emptycls, c1, (c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))))
  fdmd((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c1, c0, (c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))))
  sylib((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2): c1 → c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))
  simpr3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ≠ ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))
  fmpt(s0, c1, c2, c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  simpr2(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ≠ ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))
  necon3bii(dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), emptycls, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)}, emptycls)
  bitri(dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= ∅, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} = ∅, ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= ∅)
  dm0rn0((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqeq1i(ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), emptycls, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)})
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c1, c2)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ≠ ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))
  abrexfi(hs0, s0, c1, c2)
  imp(c0 ∈ Top, ({ hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ⊆ c0 ∧ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ≠ ∅ ∧ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ∈ Fin), ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)} ∈ c0)
  fiinopn(c0, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)})
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: unopn
blocks.content: The union of two open sets is open. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: 0opn
blocks.content: The empty set is an open subset of any topology. (Contributed by Stefan Allan, 27-Feb-2006.)

blocks.name: 0ntop
blocks.content: The empty set is not a topology. (Contributed by FL, 1-Jun-2008.)

blocks.name: topopn
blocks.content: The underlying set of a topology is an open set. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.)

blocks.name: eltopss
blocks.content: A member of a topology is a subset of its underlying set. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: riinopn
blocks.content: A finite indexed relative intersection of open sets is open. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

thm riinopn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(cin(c3, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c1, emptycls, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(cin(c3, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), c0))
  eqeltrd(cin(c3, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), c0, c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(cin(c3, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), c3))
  riin0(s0, c1, c3, c2)
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  topopn(c0, c3)
  eqeltrd(cin(c3, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0))), wne(c1, emptycls), wceq(cin(c3, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), ciin(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c2, c3)))
  3impia(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c2, c3)))
  ralimdv(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c3)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c3))
  eltopss(c0, c2, c3)
  riinn0(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  3imp1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(ciin(s0, c1, c2), c0))
  com34(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(ciin(s0, c1, c2), c0))
  3exp2(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(ciin(s0, c1, c2), c0))
  iinopn(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
}

thm riinopn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))→(c3 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2))∈ c0)
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c1, emptycls, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0)), (c3 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2))∈ c0)
  eqeltrd((c3 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), c0, c3, ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))∧ c1 = ∅))
  adantl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0)), c1 = ∅, (c3 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2))= c3)
  riin0(s0, c1, c3, c2)
  syl(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))∧ c1 = ∅), c3 ∈ c0, c0 ∈ Top)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), c1 = ∅)
  topopn(c0, c3)
  eqeltrd((c3 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), c0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2), ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  sylan((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0)), c1 ≠ ∅, (c3 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2))= ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ c3))
  3impia(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ c3))
  ralimdv(s0, c1, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), c2 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, (c2 ∈ c0 → c2 ⊆ c3))
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c2 ∈ c0, c2 ⊆ c3)
  eltopss(c0, c2, c3)
  riinn0(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  3imp1(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), c1 ≠ ∅, ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ c0)
  com34(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), c1 ≠ ∅, ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ c0)
  3exp2(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ≠ ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0), ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ c0)
  iinopn(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)

blocks.content: A finite relative intersection of open sets is open. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

thm rintopn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cin(c2, cint(c1)), c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  syl5eqel(cin(c2, cint(c1)), c0, cin(c2, ciin(hs0, c1, cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  ineq2i(c2, cint(c1), ciin(hs0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  intiin(hs0, c1)
  syl3an2b(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cin(c2, ciin(hs0, c1, cv(hs0))), c0), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dfss3(hs0, c1, c0)
  3com23(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cin(c2, ciin(hs0, c1, cv(hs0))), c0))
  riinopn(hs0, c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm rintopn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→(c2 ⋂ ⋂ c1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  syl5eqel((c2 ⋂ ⋂ c1), c0, (c2 ⋂ ⋂(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0)), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin))
  ineq2i(c2, ⋂ c1, ⋂(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0))
  intiin(hs0, c1)
  syl3an2b(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ Fin, (c2 ⋂ ⋂(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0))∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c0))
  dfss3(hs0, c1, c0)
  3com23(c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ Fin, (c2 ⋂ ⋂(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0))∈ c0)
  riinopn(hs0, c0, c1, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
